title: Find a Person's Contact Information
description: A reporter needs to find a phone number or email for a private citizen they want to interview.

tasks.description: Search public-facing social media profiles for contact information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent checks platforms like LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.

tasks.description: Use a specialized people-search database (e.g., LexisNexis) to look for phone numbers and email addresses associated with the person's name and location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds potential contact details from a private database.

tasks.description: If direct contact information isn't found, search for relatives or known associates who might be able to pass on a message.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies an alternative path to make contact.
